headline: How Recent Forecast Shifts Are Reframing The Carnival Corporation (CCL) Investment Story
summary: Carnival Corporation & is back in focus after a fresh valuation update nudged the fair value estimate from US$35.76 to US$38.00, backed by new work on cruise demand and company specific research. The slightly lower discount rate of 10.15% and higher revenue growth assumption of 4.27% reflect how analysts are weighing stronger recent spending data on cruises against ongoing questions around execution and travel trends. If you are following this story, it is worth staying tuned to see how these...
